https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I purchase the 5G bundles?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Bundles will be available under USSD and Digital channels as below:

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Are the 5G bundles available to everyone?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. The 5G ready data bundles are available to customers using smart phones are 5G & 4G capable devices.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do the 5G bundles rollover past 30days?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. Any unused bundles will expire after 30days . validity of the data volumes (Mbs) is for only 30days and cannot be extended.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use 5G Data bundle while outside 5G coverage?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. 5G data bundle will be usable when phone is connected to other Network types(5G/4G). The bundles allow for backward compatibility hence can be used by Safaricom customers in 4G and 5G ready coverage

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I purchase 5G bundle multiple times?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. You can purchase the bundles as many times.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How many 5G bundle offers can customers see when they dial *444# or *544#?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The 5G bundle will be personalized for Sh1,000 and Sh2,000 price points. However ALL customers will be able to view pricepoints of Sh3,000, Sh5,000 and Sh10,000.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the New M-PESA Agent Withdrawal journey?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a new process where customers and merchants using Business tills and Pochi La Biashara will be required to enter Agent Number and Store Number while withdrawing funds from an M-PESA Agent outlet.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Which process will be affected by this new journey?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
These include:
▪ Customer withdrawing funds from an M-PESA Agent outlet.
▪ Pochi la Biashara merchant withdrawing funds from an M-PESA Agent outlet.
▪ Lipa Na M-PESA merchant using Business Till withdrawing funds from an M-PESA Agent outlet.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Why will customers be required to enter Agent Store Number while withdrawing funds?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Agent Number and Store number will be used to verify that details belong to the same store to avoid withdrawal to the wrong agent.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can a customer be assisted If the withdrawal fails?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: When the withdrawal fails, the customer-facing staff needs to troubleshoot.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I know the SIM size for a customer?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
The customer-facing staff will log in to G2 system and follow the steps below
If the customer’s SIM size is 1000, advise the customer to swap their lines. If the customer’s SIM size is 3500 Bytes, click on the update menu on the top right of that SIM size.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I know my Agent Store Number through DIY?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: An agent will dial.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the process of customer withdrawal at an agent outlet?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The customer can withdraw cash through M-PESA App, USSD dial *334#, or the M-PESA STK menu. The customer will go to:

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the process of funds withdrawal at an agent outlet for a Pochi La Biashara merchant?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The merchant will

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the process of funds withdrawal at an agent outlet by Business till merchant?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The merchant will

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will happen if the customer does not have the option to enter store number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Kindly advise and assist the customer to update their M-PESA menu using the following steps:

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will happen if either the Agent Number or Store Number does not belong to the agent shop where the customer or merchants are transacting?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The system will check the details provided by the customer and if there is a mismatch between the Agent Number and Store Number, the transaction will fail, and the customer receive a relevant notification.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will happen if I withdraw funds from the wrong agent?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: It will not be possible to withdraw funds from the wrong agent. The Agent Number and Store Number will have to match for the transaction to complete.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will Agent Withdrawal reversal be stopped completely?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The agent can still send reversal requests via 2530 for cases such as insufficient cash, no ID or wrong amounts.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will customers and merchants know the Agent’s Store Number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: All agents’ shops will be provided with stickers displaying both Agent Number and Store Number so that customers can see them when making withdrawal transactions.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the charges for withdrawing cash from an agent?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Normal M-PESA withdrawal charges apply.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will Agent Withdrawal reversal at the Call Centre and Retail shops be stopped?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The reversal will still be processed until further communication is done for any change of processes. This process will only eliminate cases of withdrawals made to the wrong Agent Number. Other cases of the wrong amount, insufficient floats and customers not presenting IDs may arise and reversals may be requested. However, DIY reversal procedures for both agents and customers are highly encouraged. The DIY reversal procedures include sending the M-PESA message to 456, sending a message to Zuri, request reversal from M-PESA App.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are channels for customer support?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For support and inquiry, customers should contact Safaricom Call Center or visit Safaricom Retail Center.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is VoLTE?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Voice over LTE (VoLTE) is an advanced technology that delivers high-quality life-like sound over voice and video calls across the 4G network.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Why should I be on VoLTE?
What do I need to do to enjoy VoLTE Service?
How will I know if I am on VoLTE Service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For Android users: The “HD/VoLTE” icon will be shown on the top bar of the screen.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use VoLTE with any other network in the US?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Currently, we’ve launched VoLTE service with AT&T network only. This was done on 8th Dec 2022.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I be able to use roaming if I don’t activate VoLTE?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes you will, however for AT&T, they are not available on 2G & 3G.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do I need a special subscription to use VoLTE service
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, your current roaming plan will support AT&T VoLTE service.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How much does VoLTE Service cost?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: There are No additional charges on VoLTE, customer will call using airtime or minutes and normal charges will apply.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do I need to have data bundles to make video calls on VoLTE?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers can make video calls on VoLTE without data resources. The video call will be charged as a normal call from the customers` account.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: My friend does not have a phone that supports VoLTE. Can I still make calls to him/her using VoLTE?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you can make VoLTE calls to any phone on any other network just like the voice normal calls.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I confirm roaming rates?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can check the applicable roaming rates fromSafaricom Roaming.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do you have VoLTE with any other network in US?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, we currently have launched the service with AT&T only.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Sambaza Internet?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Sambaza Internet is a service that allows customers to transfer internet data bundles from one mobile number to another.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I Sambaza internet data bundles?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: One is able to sambaza internet data bundles by the below methods

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Is internet Sambaza available for both PrePay and PostPay customers?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The service is accessible to both individual PostPay and PrePay customers.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Is it possible to Sambaza my daily internet data bundles?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Daily internet data bundles cannot be transferred.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the minimum internet data bundle that I can sambaza?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The minimum is 5MB internet data bundles.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the maximum amount of internet data bundle that I can Sambaza at any one time?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The maximum amount that can be transferred at once is 10MB

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Is there a limit to the amount of internet data bundles that I can Sambaza in a day?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The maximum that you are allowed to Sambaza in a day is 20MBs

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I Sambaza all the data bundles present on my mobile number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: One should remain with a minimum of 5MB on their mobile number.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I Sambaza a FREE bundle e.g. Data bundles that I get or redeem after purchasing a phone?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Bonus / Promotional data bundles cannot be transferred.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I Sambaza the night shift internet bundles present on my line?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Night shift internet bundles are considered as promotional bundles hence can't be transferred.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I Sambaza internet data bundles to a number that has another bundle present on it, what will be the expiry date of the bundles on the receiving line?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The expiry date of the bundles present on the sender number will be compared to the expiry date for the bundles present on the receiving number then the longest expiry date will automatically be picked. If the receiving number doesn't have any bundles present then automatically the validity of the bundles sent will remain as is. For example, if I have an internet data bundle expiring on 30th March 2013 and I transfer the bundles to a number whose data bundles expire on 16th April 2013 then the expiry for all the bundles will remain as 16th April 2013.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What would be the possible causes of an internet bundle Sambaza request not going through?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The amount requested for could be out of the range of between 5MB and 900MB. The receiving line could be inactive Insufficient internet bundles on the sending line.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if I sambaza internet data bundle to a wrong number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Reversal of sambaza internet is NOT possible. Customer should confirm the mobile number before completing the request.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Easy Talk Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a new voice and SMS bundle plan that allow you a worry-free experience on Calls & SMS.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is Eligible?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The Easy talk Monthly Bundles are available to all Safaricom customers (prepaid, postpaid and hybrid)..

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I purchase Easy Talk Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: •Dial *444# select option Easy Talk Monthly which will display available plans for you•Dial *544# select option Calls & SMS – Easy Talk Monthly which will display available plans for you

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the validity of the Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Bundles are valid for 30 days,7days,2days & Midnight as indicated at the point of purchase.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will purchase of another bundle extend Validity?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The minutes and SMS resources will not rollover

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I opt subscribe multiple times?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you can purchase the bundle as many times as you wish.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I check my balance?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Balance check on USSD *444#, *544*44# and send SMS to144 to show the balance of all the resources remaining (Minutes and SMS)

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I be able to Sambaza the bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, you cannot Transfer Easy talk Bundle.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I purchase Easy Talk Bundle for another number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you can purchase for another number by dialing *444# Easy Talk Monthly and select the option for buy for another number.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I earn bonga when I Subscribe to Easy Talk Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you will earn Bonga when you subscribe to the bundle according to the bonga terms and condition.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I achieve Storo when I Subscribe to Easy Talk Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. Once you purchase a bundle, you will accumulate Storo bonus points. Applies only to Pre-pay customers who have subscribed into the service.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I buy other Minutes & airtime bundles when Subscribed to the bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you can buy other bundles.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use the minutes to call across networks?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, the resources (Minutes and SMS) can be used across networks

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Make Ur Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a Do-It-Yourself bundle that will allow customers to enjoy data and voice in an integrated or standalone bundle. Customers will be able to select a preferred price point, validity and a mix of data and voice. Customers will access the offer via USSD, Web & App.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the price range for the Make Ur Bundle subscription?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Currently the bundle allows subscription at any price point between Sh1 - 1,150.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible for Make Ur Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: All customers (prepaid and postpaid) are eligible for the bundle.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I purchase Make Ur Bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can purchase the bundle via *544#, *444# and *555#(for Blaze). The bundle will also be available via Safaricom App and Web.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I check my remaining Make Ur Bundle balance?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can check your account balance through dialing *544#, *444# or *555#, then Balance & Tips and then choosing Balance option. You shall then receive an SMS with all account balances.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use Make Ur Bundle Data resources to access any internet site?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. Awarded data resources will have no restrictions in terms of content that can be accessed.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: When my Make Ur Bundle expires, what will happen to my unused data?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Any unused data shall not be rolled over.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I purchase multiple Make Ur Bundle at a given time?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, you can purchase the bundles as many times without any restriction.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Songa by Safaricom Music App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Songa by Safaricom is a music App that will enable our subscribers to get their local and international songs in one place and keep them consistently entertained and updated.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I download the Songa by Safaricom?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The App can be downloaded from Google Play store or by dialing*812#. The App is currently available to ONLY Android users.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible to use the App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The App is available to all Prepay and Postpaid Safaricom subscribers.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What categories of Music will I find in the Songa by Safaricom Music App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The App has all genres of Music, both Local and international songs.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What other benefits will I get when I download the Songa by Safaricom App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
a. You will get FREE 2 weeks to experience the app without paying any subscription plans.
b. You will have access to all the latest music tracks.
c. You will experience a great and uninterrupted experience when listening to the music you love.
d. You will be able to stream and download music at an affordable price.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the cost of subscribing to the Songa by Safaricom music App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
• Daily @ Kshs 25
• Weekly @ kshs 150
• Monthly @kshs 499

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I use my data to stream and download music on the Songa music App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: YES. Once you subscribe to any of the daily, weekly or monthly plans, you will use your data to stream and download the songs in the app and normal data rates will apply while streaming the songs.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I be able to listen to the songs I have downloaded offline, without using my data bundles?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: YES. Once you download songs on the app, you will be able to listen to the songs using offline mode as long as you have an active subscription.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I be able to subscribe to a daily, weekly and monthly plan at the same time?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. You can only have one plan at a time. However you can upgrade your Plan by choosing the option of “Change your subscription”.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I unsubscribe from my current subscription plans?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: On the App, go to profile & subscriptions and select unsubscribe.You can also dial *100# for prepaid customers or *200# for postpaid customers, select my subscriptions, then select premium services & games, select My active SMS services, select 22122 and unsubscribe.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I access the App offline?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The App will require an internet connection to work. However you can be able to access the songs downloaded offline.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I be able to share the songs I am listening to and invite my friends to download the App?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, there will be an option to share the song through whatsapp, Facebook, Gmail etc ,your friends will receive the link, and then will be prompted to download the App then stream or download the songs.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I get a notification when new tracks are released?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: When new tracks are released, they will appear on the home page based on your selected favourite artists and tracks.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I customize my app view?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes you can be able to customize your view to change your background themes.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I send feedback/ recommendations for the app?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Select the send feedback link and share your comments. We will action any feedback received.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will artists get to put their music in the Songa music app?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: We have partnered with Content providers who will sign up the artists allowing them to have the music in the App. These content providers include Ngomma Limited, Mtech Limited, Xpedia Limited & cellulant limited.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: For more information artists can reach us on this email address
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Safaricom Pamoja Tuungane Campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Pamoja Tuungane is an initiative led by Safaricom that allows customers to redeem/donate their Bonga points or donate cash which will then be directed towards supporting their Fellow Kenyans who are Victims of Starvation.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can one Donate their Bonga points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To donate your Bonga Points, simply dial *126# or visit www.safaricom.com and select “Pamoja Tuungane“. You will then have the option to put any Bonga point amount or specified Bonga points. Once you have chosen your preferred option, you will be asked to input your Service PIN to complete the transaction. If you have forgotten your Service PIN, simply click forget to reset it.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the conversion rate for Bonga Points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customer’s 5 Bonga points will be equivalent to KES 1

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I confirm if I have donated using my Bonga points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To confirm a transaction, you will receive a message with an MPESA transaction ID and a second message that comes with the link to the Total funds’ contribution site: www.pamojatuungane.co.ke.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What if I want to contribute but do not have Bonga Points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can still contribute by Donating Cash. Simply Dial *126# and select the Donate Cash option which will then ask you to enter the amount and the MPESA PIN to complete the transaction.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens to all the funds donated?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: All the funds donated will be shared to the communities in need through the State Department of Social Protection. We also have an internal and the Ernest & Young Audit team that will ensure all funds donated are used for the purpose set aside.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I check the number of points I have?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To check how many points, you have, Dial *126# select ‘Check Bonga Points’. You will then get a response showing the number of points you have and its cash equivalent.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Are there any extra charges when I donate using Bonga Points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, there are no extra charges. Only the Bonga Points value you are donating will be deducted from your Bonga balance when you redeem

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I check the total funds contribution?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can get this under *126# Pamoja Tuungane Option 6; See total funds raised. You will get a message with the link to the site to view the same on www.pamojatuungane.co.ke

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I am not a Safaricom Subscriber can I donate towards the cause?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, all other networks will be able to Donate by paying directly into the Pay bill 444777 from their network lines, the account name will be Pamoja Tuungane

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is an M-PESA Global service that enables you to cash out from an Agent within the East African region.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who are roaming customers?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: These are customers traveling outside their country but can access a service using a visited country’s network. For example, Safaricom M-PESA registered customers accessing M-PESA services in Tanzania.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: In which countries will I be able to do M-PESA cash out using M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Currently, the Roaming cash-out service is only available in Tanzania with Vodacom Agents.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I access the service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can access the service via M-PESA App and USSD *334#.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do I need to be present at the Agent outlet to do cash out with M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, for you to receive the cash amount that you have withdrawn from the Agent outlet you must be present.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: When cashing out using M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup, do I need to present my ID or Passport to the Agent?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, you don’t need to present any document to a Vodacom Agent in Tanzania when cashing out.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the minimum and maximum amount that I can withdraw using M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The minimum amount you can withdraw is KSh. 101 and maximum KSh. 70000.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the withdrawal charges while using M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Withdrawal charges will vary depending on the amount you are withdrawing, for example withdrawing KSh. 101 to KSh. 5000 will cost you KSh.100+Forex rate.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I withdraw from a Vodacom Agent which currency, will I be given?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: If you are a Kenyan citizen using the M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup service and you cash out from a Vodacom Agent outlet in Tanzania, you will be given your money in TSh.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Why am I charged the Forex rate for using M-PESA Global Roaming Pickup service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Because the amount withdrawn must be converted into the other country’s currency before you are given. For example, you withdraw from your M-PESA account that is in KSh, but you will be given TSh which means it has to be converted first.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: For any support regarding the service, who should I contact?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
If you are in Kenya, call.
If you are outside the country, call via:
If you are outside Kenya, you will be charged for a call; the applicable rate as per our tariff guide athttp://roaming.safaricom.co.ke/i.e., the rate applicable to calls made back home (to Safaricom)

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa Card 20% Cash Back Promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a promotion that seeks to reward customers who will shop and make payments to International online merchants for goods and services using the M-PESA GlobalPay virtual VISA card.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the M-PESA GlobalPay virtual VISA?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a VISA virtual card that is linked to your M-PESA wallet. It is available on M-PESA App by selecting GlobalPay which enables you to get your card details.•The card includes a 16-digit card number, expiry date (mm/yy) and the security code also referred to as CVV.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I pay to any online merchant using M-PESA GlobalPay virtual VISA card?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The card is only able to pay to international online merchants such as Netflix, Amazon, Apple, Glovo etc. For payments to local merchants e.g., Jumia, customers will be receiving a message directing them to use the Lipa na M-PESA, Buy Goods option.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: When is the M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa Card 20% Cash Back Promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The promotion will run from 24th November 2023, 00:00:00 to 26th November 2023, 23:59:59 It is targeted for the M-PESA customers who will make payments on global websites and pay using the M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa card during the campaign period.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the objective of the promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To reward customers who shop on global websites and pay with the M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa Card. VISA card payments are accepted online and around the world at millions of merchants in over 200 countries.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Are there any other offers GlobalPay that will run during this week?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. However, some merchants may have their own independent offers on their respective websites where they could be offering discounts.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Where will the promotion be communicated?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The media channels that will run the promotion will be the Safaricom digital channels, on Youtube, twitter and Facebook handles

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the promotion mechanics?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: *Payments are based on Safaricom receiving confirmation from VISA that the merchant has received their funds. Note that online payments to merchants may not usually be settled immediately hence the lag time in giving the reward.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible for the promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This incentive is open to all registered M-PESA customers who will shop on global websites and pay using the M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa card.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can a customer shop on any global website to participate in the promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers can shop on most global website that accepts VISA Cards as a payment option. However, some merchant categories are restricted on M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa card e.g., gaming, gambling, money transfer services and crypto currency.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Are there any exceptions?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Shopping amounts below Ksh. 2,000 will not qualify for promotion. In addition, some merchant categories are restricted on M-PESA GlobalPay Virtual Visa card e.g., gaming, gambling, money transfer services and crypto currency services. Customer will receive the appropriate error message for attempts made to such websites.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if customer is not rewarded within 72hrs?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For any queries, customers can dial 100 for prepaid customers, and 200 for postpaid customers. Or visit our Retail Centers /Care desk or access our social media handles; Twitter – @Safaricom_Care and @SafaricomPLC, Facebook -www.facebook.com/SafaricomPLC

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a service that allows Safaricom M-PESA customers to send and receive money directly from other mobile money customers registered on other networks (Airtel or Telkom).

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I send money to other networks?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Dial *334#>> select Send Money>> Select Send to other Network>> enter mobile number>>enter amount and complete the transaction with your M-PESA PIN.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible to use M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Any Safaricom subscriber registered on M-PESA sending to an Airtel customer who is registered on Airtel Money or TKash for Telkom Kenya customers.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the limits for sending/receiving money on M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Daily M-PESA transaction limits apply i.e. Minimum send amount is Ksh.101 Maximum send amount is Ksh. 150,000.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does M-PESA Tuma Popote differ from normal send money transactions?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers will access M-PESA Tuma Popote via short code (USSD) to send money to mobile money registered users on other networks as opposed to sending money to other M-PESA subscribers via Sim Toolkit or the Safaricom app.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I send money to customers who are not registered for mobile money on the other networks?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This will be via M-PESA menu on the sim tool kit, M-PESA on USSD - *334# or M-PESA APP and charges for sending to unregistered customers will apply.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will I be charged for sending money via M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The current send money on net tariff will apply when sending money via M-PESA Tuma Popote while customers sending to unregistered using the menu option will be charged the off net tariff.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does the recipient access the money?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Money sent via M-PESA Tuma Popote will be credited directly to the recipient’s mobile money wallet where it can be accessed via the applicable channels.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will the recipient be charged to withdraw money sent via M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The recipient will be charged according to the tariff of their mobile money service.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens when I send money to a wrong recipient via M-PESA Tuma Popote?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers should call Safaricom or SMS 100 or 200 in order to initiate reversals.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible for the Voice Plan?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The voice plan is available to all prepay, individual post-pay & hybrid subscribers.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What will I use the voice plan for?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The Voice plan will be used for both on-net and off-net calls.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will a customer purchase the voice plan?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The voice plan will be available once your purchase your talk time on *544# via airtime or M-PESA.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I check my voice plan balance?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Balance check will be available on USSD *544#, *544*44# and 144 for prepay.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the validity of the voice plan purchased?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The voice plan will not expire

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can you Sambaza the voice plan purchased?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Subscribers cannot transfer/ Sambaza their voice plan

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can the voice plan be used for browsing?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The voice plan cannot be used to access the internet.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I earn bonga points once I purchase the voice plan?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. Customers will earn bonga points when they purchase the voice plan.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I purchase the voice plan for another number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. Customers should be able to purchase the voice plan for self and other numbers

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I make international calls with the voice plan?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers cannot use the voice plan to make international calls.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the Free Safaricom Internet Offers?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a daily personalized mobile data bundle that is awarded to each customer to enjoy Safaricom internet for free.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I Pay for this bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The product is absolutely free. You will not need to pay for it.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is eligible for the bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The bundle can be accessed by any Safaricom customer.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I access the free bundle more than once per day?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, you will only be allowed to access your free bundle once a day.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will my free bundle be given priority for consumption?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, the Free bundle will be consumed first before other bundles are used.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I sambaza my free bundle?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, you will not be allowed to transfer the free internet bundle.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the free Safaricom internet bundle roll-over?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, the free Safaricom internet bundle will only be valid for a specific period after the customer has redeemed it, then it will expire. The customer will be informed of the validity of their bundle via SMS.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is multiple Okoa?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a feature within Okoa Jahazi that allows Multiple borrowing

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Does that mean I can borrow many times in a week?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: YES. Customers can borrow as many times as theirPrevious week usagecan allow every week.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does Okoa Jahazi work at the present moment?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers can only borrow after they have paid their existing loan

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What's the Okoa repayment period and does it change with the new feature?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Five (5 )days repayment period.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Does each loan have its 5 day lifespan?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Each loan takes its own 5 day Service Legal Agreement(SLA).

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does the customer get to know the limit per week?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: By dialing *131# the customer will view a list of denominations they can access. The highest denomination denotes the highest amount the customer qualifies for within each week.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Is there an opt in process for the service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The capability will be available to all prepay customers allowing them to Okoa multiple times

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens when the first loan matures?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Each loan has a 5 day maturity period, if unpaid by day 6 then the customer will be blacklisted from Okoa Jahazi

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Does the customer get notified before maturity date?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, by way of an SMS notification.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How many okoa loans can a customer have?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: A customer can borrow multiple times as long as their previous weeks usage allows for it.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will a lipa Mdogo Mdogo customer be eligible for multiple okoa?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. All prepay customers will be eligible.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will new customers be allowed to access okoa & borrow multiple times
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Age on Network will be capped at 14 days. On the 15th day the customers will be able to access okoa & enjoy multiple borrowing

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will repayment be done?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Every top up via all channels ( MPESA, voucher, 3rd party, pin less) will go towards settling any outstanding okoa debts

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Has Okoa internet also been kitted with multiple borrowing capabilities?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: YES. A customer can Okoa Internet many times based on their previous weeks usage.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: MALI is a Money Market Fund approved by the Capital Markets Authority that allows M-PESA customers to invest in Unit Trust from as low as KSH 100 and earn daily interest.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the channels for accessing MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The service is available on the M-PESA Super App under GROW and on USSD *334#, option 5.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I register for Mali?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: On the M-PESA Super App, go to Grow > Select MALI > Acknowledge accepting T&Cs by Tapping on the Opt In tab > Enter M-PESA PIN. Alternatively, Dial *334# > Select 5. Financial services > Select 0. MALI > Select Accept the T&Cs > Enter M-PESA PIN.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What interest do I earn for investing in MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Investing in MALI will give a competitive annual return. The interest is computed and compounded daily.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How much does the government charge on the interest earned on the investment?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: A 15% withholding tax is charged on any interest earned from your investment. Therefore, interest paid into your investment account is already net of these charges/fees.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the transaction charges for using MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers’ deposits and withdrawals from the MALI account will be free.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I deposit or withdraw funds from MALI directly to an agent or to the bank account?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. Customers will invest funds from their M-PESA accounts and or withdraw funds from their MALI accounts to their M-PESA accounts.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the transaction limit for MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: There is no maximum investment in Mali. However, the daily M-PESA transaction limit of Ksh.500,000 and per transaction limit of Ksh. 250,000 are applicable. The minimum amount to Invest is Kshs.100, and the minimum amount you can withdraw is Kshs.10.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if I want to withdraw an amount above Kes.500,000 in a day?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The request will fail, and you will receive a message indicating the transaction range.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What document should I provide for the next of Kin claims?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Next of Kin is the person whose details you update on MALI and in the event of incapacities such as sickness, mental instability, and death they can have access to your funds The customer (Next of Kin) will provide the following documents:

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Which channel should I use to make Next of Kin claims?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You’ll be required to visit the nearest Safaricom Retail shop or care desks for assistance with processing Next of Kin claim.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I change ownership of my Mali Account to my Next of Kin?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
No. You cannot change the ownership of your MALI account. Should you need to change the ownership of your line, you’ll need to withdraw all your funds and opt out of MALI and follow the current process for change of ownership of MSISDN and/or account details.
After successful change of ownership of the MSISDN, and your Next of Kin details are captured, they will be able to Opt In to MALI to enjoy its services. The new owner of the line should opt into MALI to enjoy its services.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if I attempt to close an account with funds?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You will receive a prompt that advises you to withdraw all the funds before Opting out of MALI. Should you choose to withdraw funds and close account, then the funds will be automatically transferred to your M-PESA account and opt out request processed successfully.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I claim funds from a recycled SIM card?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To claim funds from a recycled SIM card, you will be required to fill in a claim form and present your ID at the Safaricom Retail shop or Customer Care desks

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Where do I get support for MALI?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For support and inquiry, customers should contact Safaricom Contact Center on 100/200 or email:This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.or visit the Safaricom Retail Center/ Customer Care Desk.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Why are we making the change?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
• Improved User Experience: We're eliminating the voucher system, which often led to confusion and inconvenience with expiring vouchers and redemption difficulties.
• Enhanced Security: Aligning with Central Bank of Kenya regulations strengthens the security of your transactions, ensuring peace of mind for all users.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Don't worry, you can still:
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
• Send and receive money seamlessly if you are a registered M-PESA, Airtel Money and T-Kash user.
• Enjoy all your favorite M-PESA services through *334#, SIM Toolkit, M-PESA App, and MySafaricom App.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What do I do if I have an active voucher?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Redeem it at any M-PESA Agent by 13th February 2024. After that, vouchers expire, and funds return to the sender.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if I try to send money to an unregistered mobile money user?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You will receive a notification that the recipient of money is not registered for mobile money and the transaction will fail.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I check if I am a registered M-PESA subscriber?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You can verify by checking if you have the M-PESA menu on your SIM card. If you have been or are able to use all the M-PESA services both for sending or receiving mobile money, you are registered!

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Registering is easy!
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Safaricom customers can visit a Safaricom Shop or M-PESA Agent with their Identification Document (ID). For those redeeming their vouchers, as you withdraw cash with our agents you can register for M-PESA services.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Bonga For Good?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a service which enables you to pay your bills at Lipa Na M-PESA merchants countrywide using your Bonga points.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I access Bonga For Good services?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customer will be required to dial *126# and select “Lipa Na Bonga” and move to enter either the Pay bill or Till Number of the merchant.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the conversion rate for Bonga For Good?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customer will exchange 1 bonga point to KES 30 cents

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I confirm if I have paid using my Bonga points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To confirm a transaction, compare the transaction ID you have received with the one from that the merchant has received. To note, All payments paid using Bonga points will come with the customer name ‘Safaricom Bonga’

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Do I need to reconcile the Bonga payments at the end of the day?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, you will not. The payment to the till is immediate. No need to reconcile later.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: The customer has overpaid their bill. Can I reverse the transaction?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, normal Lipa Na MPESA reversal process will be used. If the customer has sufficient points, the customer can initiate another transaction and indicate the correct amount

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens if a I pay into a till but have insufficient Bonga Points ?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The customer transaction will only be completed successfully if they have sufficient points in their account.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I check the number of points I need to pay for my bill?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To check how many points you will need to pay for your bill, dial *126# select ‘Lipa Na Bonga’, then select ‘Bonga Calculator’. You will be requested to put in the amount you want to pay. You will get a response showing the number of points you will need to pay your bill.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I redeem my points at the till?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To redeem your Bonga Points, simply dial *126# and select “Lipa Na Bonga “. You will be asked to enter the Till No, the amount you want to pay and your service PIN.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I check how many Bonga points I have?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To check your Bonga Points, simply dial *126# and select "Check Bonga Balance". You will receive an SMS notification with details of your Bonga account balance.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I change or reset my Bonga Pin?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: To change or reset your Bonga PIN simply dial *126# and select Set or Change Bonga PIN and follow the prompts.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I am a corporate client how do I access Bong Points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For corporate employees who may not be able to see/redeem their points please check with your company administration for further information

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I do not have enough Bonga points, can I top up with cash or M-PESA?What is the out of bundle management?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This will be at the merchants discretion. You will need to confirm at the outlet.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Are there any extra charges when I pay my bill using my Bonga points?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, there are no extra charges. Only the Bonga Points value of the bill you are paying will be deducted from your Bonga balance when you redeem.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: I have keyed in the wrong amount and want my points back. How do I go about it?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: If you have put in a lower amount, you may redeem more points to cater for the difference.If you have keyed in a larger amount, you will need to contact Customer care for them to initiate the reversal. You will receive a confirmation SMS once the points are reversed to your account.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is M-PESA Global-Send to Mobile?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a service that enables M-PESA registered customers to send money to mobile numbers to individuals in East Africa and Asia i.e., Bangladesh and Pakistan.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can one access this service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
To enjoy the M-PESA, you need to opt-in to M-PESA Global
To opt-in:
You will receive a successful opt-in SMS from Safaricom.
Via USSD *334#

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I send money to mobile numbers in different countries?

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is Shine Kenya National Promo?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
This is a Safaricom Promotion aimed at appreciating our customers for their continued support and loyalty. Eligible customers shall win various prizes ranging from Free Minutes, SMS, Data, M-PESA Cash back or 30 Weekly Millionaires and one lucky winner in the grand draw will walk away with Ksh 5Million. The winners will be drawn randomly fromevery part of Kenya!
In addition, the 30 lucky winners will each get 250K as a community prize and the Grand draw winner will get 1M as community prize. These community prizes will be used to deliver community projects in collaboration with Safaricom Foundation and will not go directly to the winners.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is Eligible? How does one enrol for the Shine Kenya National Promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
The Campaign is open toall new and existing Safaricom subscriberswho are aged eighteen (18) years and above. Your line needs to be active to participate in the promotion.
The Campaign will not be open to:
All Safaricom employees, All Safaricom Dealers and their employees, Safaricom Suppliers, and family members of any of these mentioned categories.
All underage (below 18 years) subscribers, any subscriber within demarcated prison sites and Expired, Inactive and pooled numbers are not eligible to play in the Promotion unless they are reactivated by topping up and buying a bundle.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are Shine bundles?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: These are valuable integrated offers where customer will enjoy a combination of Data, Voice, SMS with an addition of either Skiza, Base Video or Education content Bundle (Kalamu) that will also earn one entries into the Shine Kenya Promotion.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the validity of the free content?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: All Free Content will be valid till midnight.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the additional content renew automatically?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The free pass for Education and Video content will be valid for the day and is a one-off Subscription. The Skiza tune however one will be required to dial *811# and select a FREE Skiza tune of their choice which will be on autorenewal at Ksh 1.5

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: If I have more than 1 Safaricom Line registered with my ID will they all be eligible for the promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does the Promotion Work?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For every eligible transaction (Refer to FAQ no. 3), a customer will earn an 1 entry into the daily, weekly and Grand draw. The more entries the subscriber has, the more they stand a chance to win.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use my entries to redeem other Safaricom Products and Services?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No.The entries are only for the purpose of the Shine Kenya promotion. All entries shall expire at the end of the Promotion period once the grand draw is finalized.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I check entries earned during the Promotional Period?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Dial *444#, *544#,*334#,*555#, or go MySafaricomAPP , *M-PESA APP* or Web to check your entries.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will I get a notification of my entries for every eligible transaction?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes.However, Customers who have blocked Safaricom Promotional messages will not receive the Shine Kenya entries notifications unless they enable Safaricom notifications.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who earns entries when one buys eligible resources for another number?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The customer who makes the purchase (Party A) will earn the Shine Kenya entries.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I Opt Out of the Shine Kenya National Promotion?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
To Opt out dial *544#, *444#, *334# ,*555# or via MySafaricomApp and select Opt out of the Shine Kenya Promotion.
Any subscriber who opts out of the promotion will not be eligible to win any of the prizes unless the opt back in.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can one Opt back In after they have Opted Out?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, to Opt back In dial * 544#, *444#, *334#, *555# or Via MySafaricomAPP.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Once I Opt back In will I get back the entries I had accumulated before Opting out?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. You will continue from where you left of.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I use the Minutes or SMS winnings to make International Calls or send SMS internationally?

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How long will the Shine Kenya Promotion run?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The Promotion will run for eight (8) weeks fromJune 7th 2024, to August 3rd 2024and will be conducted nationwide.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will I be notified if I am a winner?

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the M-PESA Jumia discount campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a one-month campaign that seeks to reward customers with a 5% discount when they shop and pay for goods via M-PESA on Jumia.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How long will the campaign run?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The campaign will run from 02/11/2020 - for 6 weeks.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Which merchants will participate in the campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: All purchases worth over Ksh 1,000 and paid for using M-PESA from Jumia Mall and Jumia Food qualify for the 5% discount

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will Physical stores be participating in the discount campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The discount campaign targets M-PESA customers who shop online. Purchases made in physical outlets and supermarketsdo notqualify..

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will M-PESA customers be awarded during the campaign period?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: M-PESA customers will benefit from a 5% discount on transactions worth more than Ksh 1,000 - capped at Ksh 250 per transaction.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will customers get a 5% discount each time they shop?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No, customers will get a discount only on their first 3 M-PESA transactions worth over Ksh 1,000.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who is the target of this campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The campaign targets M-PESA registered customers to encourage them to use mobile money during the Covid-19 period.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will customers stand a chance to win any physical prizes?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: There will benophysical prizes to be won.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will customers all over the country benefit from the 1-month discount campaign?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes, the campaign will cover M-PESA customers countrywide.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How will customers know they have received any discount amount?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The 5% discount will be automatically applied to a customer’s total bill on the checkout stage – the final amount, less the discount is what the customer will finally pay.The customer will receive the usual M-PESA confirmation message.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: In case of any arising issues, who can customers call?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: For any M-PESA account related queries, customers can call line 234, 200, or 200. Or use any of the Safaricom online support channels.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the M-PESA statement service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: This is a service that enables you as anM-PESAregistered customer to download stamped M-PESA statements on your phone or send them directly to your email address.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What are the benefits of this service?
How can one access the service and how much does it cost?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The service can be accessed from M-PESA App or by dialing *334# from their mobile phone and is free for all M-PESA customers.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How can I access my M-PESA statements?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
You can access your M-PESA statements via M-PESA App or USSD *334#.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can I change my e-mail address?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. However, you can enter a new email address when you are requesting your M-PESA statement.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What happens when I want my M-PESA statements which are older than 2 years?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You are required to visit your nearest Safaricom Shop.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How long does Safaricom take to send my statement?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Customers will receive their statements within 5 minutes of making a successful request.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: I have an M-PESA statement that has a disclaimer indicating that it cannot be used in court. How can I get a statement that does not bear the disclaimer for I can use in court?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
Please visit the nearest Safaricom shop and inform them that you would like an M-PESA statement for court purposes.
If the statement is required for a civil matter, then you must fill in the civil disputes statement request form indicating the purpose of use.
You will be provided with a form for which you will indicate your details and provide your ID. A request will be created for processing.
Note:Statements issued for this purpose will be restricted to civil cases and not criminal cases. (Criminal cases are cases that involve a police investigation and/or prosecution).

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Which M-PESA transaction types are not supported?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The following transaction types are not supported, but will be availed in future:

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What transaction value limits are supported by the standing order?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Regular M-PESA transaction limits of KSh. 250,000 per transaction and KSh.500,000 per day shall apply. These limits do not include the transaction fees.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the customer incur extra costs to use this service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Yes. There will be a standard M-PESA Ratiba charge of KSh 5 per transaction (send money, Paybill, Lipa na M-PESA) above the normal M-PESA transaction charges.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will Fuliza apply where the customer has insufficient balance?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. The customer will be required to have sufficient funds to complete the transaction. The transaction will fail where one has insufficient balance in their M-PESA.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will failed payment attract any penalties or charges?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The customer will not be penalized for failed standing orders occurring because of insufficient funds in their M-PESA wallets.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the customer need to set the date and time of disbursement
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Only the start and end date of the disbursement will be set. The time (HH:MM) of disbursement will be set automatically as the time the customer completed each standing order creation process. On the day of disbursement, the transfer will be done exactly 5 minutes after the set HH: MM.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Where a transaction fails for one reason or another, will the system attempt to retry another transfer automatically?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. Once the date and time have passed, no transaction shall be processed. The customer will however still be able to make the payments manually.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the customer be notified of upcoming disbursement whether they have sufficient balance or not?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
• On the mini-App, one can schedule reminders (for manually initiated transactions) or schedule auto-debit transfers.
• The *334# USSD channel only supports the auto debit model which does not send reminders prior to the transfer being effected.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the customer be required to enter M-PESA PIN during M-PESA Ratiba setup?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: M-PESA PIN will be required at the time of opting in and accepting the terms and conditions of the service. One will also require their M-PESA PIN when setting up the automatic standing orders.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Will the customer be required to enter M-PESA PIN each time a scheduled payment is due?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: No. Once the setup is complete, the transfer of funds will be effected without the need to enter M-PESA PIN each time.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How does one opt into the M-PESA Ratiba ?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
The customer must opt in and accept the Terms and Conditions, before being allowed to create standing orders or schedule payments.
Via USSD *334#

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I create a standing order on M-PESA Ratiba?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: One must have opted in and accepted the terms and conditions above, to set up standing orders.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can a standing order be modified?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: One cannot modify a standing order once it has been created. The customer can, however, delete it and create a new one.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can transactions be reversed once sent?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The usual transaction reversal procedure will apply where funds have been sent out. However, the customer is responsible for managing their scheduled orders and canceling any that they do not wish to complete before the funds are sent out.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Can this service support recurring payments for services such as Netflix?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Not now. For these, kindly use the M-PESA GlobalPay card service available on our M-PESA Super App and on the Financial Services menu of *334#.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How many standing orders can be scheduled at a time?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: There is currently no limit. One can schedule as many requests as possible.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the priority of payment when multiple orders have identical dates?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The system will queue the payments depending on the order in which they were set up, based on first come first served.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Does a scheduled standing order expire after a period?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: The standing order will only be executed between the start and end dates as set by the customer. Expired standing orders will automatedly be deleted after the end date scheduled by the customer.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the difference between deleting a standing order and opting out of M-PESA Ratiba service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Deleting a standing order only cancels the payment that was scheduled, whereas opting out removes the customer from the M-PESA Ratiba service after they have deleted all scheduled standing orders. Once opted out, the customer will have to accept the Terms and Conditions to opt back in and use the service.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Where a customer incurs a penalty somewhere else due to failure to disburse funds, will the customer be compensated?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: Safaricom will do all that is within its power to ensure all services are optimally available. However, the customer needs to monitor and ensure the funds are manually sent in case of delays to the M-PESA systems. Please refer to the Terms and Conditions of this service for further details.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: In case of any queries and more information,

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: Who can participate in the promotion?

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How long will the promotion run?

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is happening?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
MTN UgandaTo enable M-PESA registered subscribers in Kenya to send money to MTN Subscribers in Uganda
MTN RwandaTo enable M-PESA registered subscribers in Kenya to send and receive money from MTN Subscribers in Rwanda
VodacomTo enable M-PESA registered subscribers in Kenya to send and receive money from Vodacom subscribers in Tanzania.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What do I need to access the service?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: NB:M-PESA transaction limits apply.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: What is the process of sending money:
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
To a MTN Uganda Subscriber?
1. Dial *840#
2. Enter your preferred PIN
3. Select Send Money
4. Enter destination phone number in the international format e.g. 256xxxxxxxxxx
5. Enter amount and confirm
To a MTN Rwanda Subscriber?
1. Dial *840#
2. Enter your preferred PIN
3. Select Send Money
4. Enter destination phone number in the international format e.g. 250xxxxxxxxxx
5. Enter amount and confirm
To a Vodacom Tanzania subscriber?
1. Go to M-PESA menu and select Lipa na M-PESA.
2. Select paybill and enter business number 255255.
3. Enter recipients mobile number as account number in the format 2557XXXXXXXX.
4. Enter amount, M-PESA PIN and confirm the transaction.
NB:If you do not have Lipa Na M-PESA on your menu, go to M-PESA, select my account and update menu. A new menu will be sent to you at no cost.

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How do I know the money has been received?
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: You will receive a notification from M-PESA confirming the status of the transaction. You will also receive an additional message from M-PESA IMT

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: In what currency will the money be delivered to the recipient:
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer: In Uganda?The funds will be delivered as Ugandan shillingsIn Rwanda?The funds will be delivered as Rwandan FrancsIn Tanzania?The funds will be delivered in Tanzanian Shillings

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
In Ugandan Shillings?
1. Dial *840#
2. Enter your service PIN
3. Enter amount in Kenya Shillings that you want to send
4. Enter destination phone number in international format e.g. 256xxxxxxxxx
You will receive a pop up message withTotal to send (UGS)Total charges (KES)Total M-PESA used
In Rwandan Francs?
1. Dial *840#
2. Enter your service PIN
3. Enter amount in Kenya Shillings that you want to send
4. Enter destination phone number in international format e.g. 250xxxxxxxxx
You will receive a pop up message withTotal to send (RWF)Total charges (KES)Total M-PESA used
In Tanzanian Shillings?
1. Dial *840#
2. Enter your service PIN
3. Enter amount in Kenya Shillings that you want to send
4. Enter destination phone number in international format e.g. 255xxxxxxxxx
You will receive a pop up message withTotal to send (TZS)Total charges (KES)Total M-PESA used

https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.question: How much will I be charged for receiving M-PESA from:
https://www.safaricom.co.ke/media-center.answer:
MTN Rwanda?There are no charges for receiving M-PESA from MTN Rwanda.  However all other M-PESA charges apply when you use the funds e.g. withdraw, send money, pay bills or Lipa NA M-PESA.
